title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.15 - Action by commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 3.15 - Action by commissioner

State Regulations
(a) Where
a decision or action is under review by the commissioner, such decision or
action shall be considered valid until other instructions are issued by the
commissioner. (b) Instructions by
the commissioner setting forth his determination in a matter will be issued in
such form and with as much specificity as he may deem appropriate in the
circumstances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
3.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
